Uses of Interface
imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D

  • Packages that use Mapping2D 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.lib.image  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

    • Uses of Mapping2D in imagingbook.lib.image

      Constructors in imagingbook.lib.image with parameters of type Mapping2D 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageMapper(Mapping2D mp)
      Creates a new instance with the specified geometric mapping.
      ImageMapper(Mapping2D mp, InterpolationMethod im)
      Creates a new instance with the specified geometric mapping and pixel interpolation method.

    • Uses of Mapping2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings

      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings that return Mapping2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Mapping2D Mapping2D.getInverse()
      The inverse of this mapping is calculated (if possible) and returned.

    • Uses of Mapping2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

      Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear that implement Mapping2D 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AffineMapping2D
      This class represents an affine transformation in 2D, which can be defined by three pairs of corresponding points.
      class  LinearMapping2D
      This class represents an arbitrary linear transformation in 2D.
      class  ProjectiveMapping2D
      This class represents a projective transformation in 2D (also known as a "homography").
      class  Rotation2D
      This class represents a pure 2D rotation about the coordinate origin (as a special case of affine mapping).
      class  Scaling2D
      This class represents a 2D scaling transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
      class  Shear2D
      This class represents a 2D shear transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
      class  Translation2D
      This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine transformation).

    • Uses of Mapping2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear

      Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear that implement Mapping2D 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BilinearMapping
      This class represents a bilinear transformation in 2D with 8 parameters a0, ..., a3, b0, ..., b3 of the form
      class  RippleMapping
      A non-linear mapping that produces a ripple effect.
      class  SphereMapping
      A non-linear mapping that produces a spherical distortion.
      class  TwirlMapping
